alert.note: Alert for Greater Portland Metro Area (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued May 10 at 5:29PM PDT until May 11 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Low temperatures ranging between 32-36F will result in frost formation. * WHERE...For the outlying communities around the Greater Portland and Vancouver Metro. This includes the western Tualatin Valley around Hillsboro, Forest Grove and Banks and northern Clark County around Ridgefield, Battle Ground and Hockinson. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Frost is much less likely to occur across the higher hills of the region and in the main urban centers of Portland and Vancouver.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
